name: CLOAKED, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Educate Members of Congress about ways to protect personal information
Educate policymakers on issues related to data privacy and security, including the American Privacy Rights Act discussion draft; educate policymakers about Cloakeds privacy features.
Educate policymakers on issues related to data privacy and security, including H.R.8818, the American Privacy Rights Act; educate policymakers about Cloakeds privacy features.
